oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Zur Inzidenz klinischer Mastitiden und ihrer Therapie in Milchviehbetrieben des ökologischen Landbaus
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kroemker, Prof. Dr. Volker
Pfannenschmidt, Dr. Florian
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: During a dynamic cohort study performed in 12 randomly selected organic farms of Lower Saxony between April 2002 and April 2003, data on mastitis frequency and therapeutic measures was collected in the first place. The incidence of clinical mastitis on organic farms was 45.2 cases per 100-cow-years at risk with a broad range. Regarding the therapy of clinical mastitis cases, the differences between allopathic, homoeopathic and no therapy were apparently marginal.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kroemker, Prof. Dr. Volker and Pfannenschmidt, Dr. Florian (2005) Zur Inzidenz klinischer Mastitiden und ihrer Therapie in Milchviehbetrieben des ökologischen Landbaus. [Mastitis Incidence and Therapy in Organic Dairy Farms.] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
